sentences.en: A sharp white spotlight beamed down on a small stage.
sentences.cn: 聚光灯的强烈白光照在小舞台上。

sentences.en: A spotlight threw a pool of violet light on the stage.
sentences.cn: 聚光灯在舞台上洒下一团紫光.

sentences.en: At first glance, the spotlight - hogging boss seems the villain.
sentences.cn: 乍一看, 好抢镜头的上司似乎是个反面人物.

sentences.en: He likes to be in the spotlight.
He wanted to be in [ to hold ] the spotlight.
sentences.cn: 他想成为众所瞩目的中心.

sentences.en: However, dating under the spotlight rarely leads to long - lasting love.
sentences.cn: 但这种聚光灯下的约会难以产生持久的爱情.

sentences.en: Let China make some mistakes. It'll take the spotlight off of us.
sentences.cn: 让中国人去犯错, 这样会让世人的目光从偶们身上转开.

sentences.en: Plus , new features like'Cut , Copy & Paste ', MMS, Spotlight search and more.
sentences.cn: 而且还有诸如拷贝剪切粘贴, 彩信, Spotlight 搜索等的其他功能.

sentences.en: She is tired of being in the spotlight.
Spotlight search is located to the left of the main home screen.
sentences.cn: spotlight搜索在主程序界面的左侧.

sentences.en: The article spotlights the problems of the homeless.
sentences.cn: 文章专门探讨了无家可归者的种种问题。

sentences.en: The spotlight followed her round the stage.
sentences.cn: 聚光灯的光圈随着她在舞台上转.

sentences.en: The yard was lit by three huge spotlights.
sentences.cn: 院子里亮着三盏巨大的聚光灯。

sentences.en: Then the spotlight centered on us , and a silence fell as we started to play.
sentences.cn: 但当聚光灯对准我们开始演奏时, 会场顿时静了下来.

sentences.en: This week the spotlight is on the world of fashion.
sentences.cn: 本周引人瞩目的是时装界.

sentences.en: Webb is back in the spotlight.

words.tran_cn: [电]聚光灯；反光灯；公众注意的中心

phrases.tran_cn: 处于公众注意的中心；出风头

trans.tran_cn: 聚光灯，公众注意或突出显著，射光圈，探照灯
trans.tran_en: a light with a very bright beam which can be directed at someone or something. Spotlights are often used to light a stage when actors or singers are performing

trans.tran_cn: 用聚光灯照； 特别关注； 突出报道
trans.tran_en: to shine a strong beam of light on something

trans.tran_cn: 聚光照明，使公众注意，使突出醒目
